title: Imagine the Beach
description: Imagine the sound of the waves crashing on shore, the warm ocean breeze, and the sand beneath your toes. In Imagine the Beach, students are invited to use their imagination and senses to take a trip to the beach in their mind's eye. Colorful photographs support students' learning as they practice visualizing and classifying information.
reviewWords: crashing, dive, imagine, rough, salty, sense
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
grammar: Interrogative Sentences                : Identify and use interrogative sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words can, what, and you
